meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking life or vitality.
meanings.sent1: The lifelessnesses of the desert were evident in the barren landscape.
meanings.sent2: The hospital room was filled with lifelessnesses after the power outage.
meanings.sent3: The party had a strange vibe of lifelessnesses, as if everyone was a robot.
meanings.sent4: The lifelessnesses of the abandoned house gave it an eerie feel.
meanings.sent5: The lifelessnesses of the old tree made it seem like a ghostly figure in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: The condition of being without energy or animation.
meanings.sent1: The lifelessnesses of the exhausted athlete were apparent after the race.
meanings.sent2: The classroom was filled with lifelessnesses on the hot summer afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The cat's lifelessnesses after a big meal made it look like a lazy ball of fur.
meanings.sent4: The lifelessnesses of the clock's ticking symbolized the end of time.
meanings.sent5: The lifelessnesses of the empty playground echoed in the silence of the park.
